root: ^Hey sera,  Can I ask you something?
^Why'd you actually take this job? And don't say the money.

A: ^Because I was bored out of my mind. I've been rewatching the same anime for the third time and eating nothing but indomie for two weeks.
^Hey, at least I'm self-aware about my life choices. Besides, creepy island mystery beats staring at my ceiling wondering if I have the money to buy another manga for my collection again.
B: ^Because you looked like you needed the distraction. You've been moping around for weeks, sighing dramatically every five minutes.
^Oh, you absolutely mope. It's like living with a sad ancient ghost. "Oh, the weight of existence without meaning..." (mimics his flat tone)
^(almost smiling) I don't sound like that.
^You totally do. But hey, nothing cures existential dread like a good old-fashioned job, right?
C: ^Because abandoned islands sound cool. I mean, when's the last time we got to investigate somewhere actually interesting?
^Our last three jobs were a haunted ATM, a possessed bus, and that weird thing with the singing toilet.
^Disturbing, yes, but not exactly exotic vacation material. This? It's like something out of a horror movie, but with better pay.
^You realize horror movies don't usually end well for the protagonists, right?
^Good thing we're not the protagonist type. We’ll survive no problem.
